function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Haze particles can affect the heart and lungs, especially in people with chronic heart or lung disease.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory and cardiovascular illness.","Mitigation":"Monitoring air quality and using appropriate respiratory protection.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, N95 masks, and air purifiers.","People":"People with chronic heart or lung disease.","Owner":"Health organizations and government agencies."},{"Description":"Worsening air quality leading to high demand for N95 masks.","Impact":"Shortage of N95 masks and potential exposure to harmful particles.","Mitigation":"Increasing manufacturing capacity, implementing reuse programs, and promoting alternative protective measures.","Technologies":"3D printing, automation, and advanced manufacturing techniques.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and at-risk individuals.","Owner":"Manufacturers, government agencies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Environmental pollution from fashion industry contributing to carbon emissions and ocean pollution.","Impact":"Increase in environmental pollution and public health risks.","Mitigation":"Adopting sustainable practices, reducing carbon footprint, and minimizing plastic waste.","Technologies":"Eco-friendly materials, closed-loop manufacturing, and waste management systems.","People":"General public and environmentally conscious consumers.","Owner":"Fashion industry companies and governing bodies."}]}
